downloadTitle: Microsoft Teams BYOD Rooms and Bookable Desks Manual Device Discovery script
downloadDescription: A PowerShell script that queries and exports attached peripheral information.
detailsSection: A PowerShell script that queries and exports attached peripheral information for use in Microsoft Teams Bring Your Own Device (BYOD) data entry in the Pro Management Portal (PMP) for enhanced reporting.
installInstructionSection:
1. Download and extract Get-TeamsBYODSpaceDevices.zip, or check GitHub for a newer version at https://gist.github.com/adthom/b703078806adeb71fe860929df0bd4c1.
  2. Move the script, Get-TeamsBYODSpaceDevices.ps1, to your preferred location on your computer.
  3. Unblock execution of Get-TeamsBYODSpaceDevices.ps1.
  4. In a PowerShell window, run the script by entering its path and file name. If the current folder is the location of the script, enter: .\Get-TeamsBYODSpaceDevices.ps1.
